body_html:
Do you have the ability to recompile from source? I can think of a small patch that would make it easier to diagnose the problem.

(I don't think it's related to the particular use of truncated_normal, and it still seems like an address misconfiguration to me, although using IP addresses rules out DNS misconfiguration.)
body_text:
Do you have the ability to recompile from source? I can think of a small patch that would make it easier to diagnose the problem.
(I don't think it's related to the particular use of truncated_normal, and it still seems like an address misconfiguration to me, although using IP addresses rules out DNS misconfiguration.)
body:
Do you have the ability to recompile from source? I can think of a small patch that would make it easier to diagnose the problem.

(I don't think it's related to the particular use of `truncated_normal`, and it still seems like an address misconfiguration to me, although using IP addresses rules out DNS misconfiguration.)
